mapper.select: SELECT a.user_id id, a.office_id AS "officeId", a.org_id AS "companyId", a.login_name loginName, a.password, a.user_name name, a.email, a.phone_no phone, a.mobile_no mobile, a.user_type userType, a.login_ip loginIp, a.login_date loginDate, a.remarks, a.login_flag loginFlag FROM com_user a WHERE del_flag!='Y' AND upper(a.login_name) = upper(#{loginName})

SELECT a.user_id id, a.office_id AS "officeId", a.org_id AS "companyId", a.login_name loginName, a.password, a.user_name name, a.email, a.phone_no phone, a.mobile_no mobile, a.user_type userType, a.login_ip loginIp, a.login_date loginDate, a.remarks, a.login_flag loginFlag FROM com_user a WHERE del_flag!='Y' AND a.user_id = #{id}
SELECT a.role_id id, a.role_name name, a.role_enname enname, a.role_type AS roleType, a.is_sys AS sysData FROM com_role a WHERE a.role_name = #{name} AND a.del_flag !='Y'
SELECT a.role_id id, a.role_name name, a.role_enname enname, a.role_type AS roleType, a.is_sys AS sysData FROM com_role a WHERE a.role_id = #{id} AND a.del_flag !='Y'

SELECT a.role_id id, a.role_name name, a.role_enname enname, a.role_type AS roleType, a.remarks, a.del_flag, a.is_sys AS sysData FROM com_role a, com_role_user ur WHERE ur.role_id = a.role_id AND a.del_flag='N' AND ur.user_id= #{userId}

SELECT distinct a.role_id id, a.role_name name, a.role_enname enname, a.role_type AS roleType, a.remarks, a.del_flag, a.is_sys AS sysData FROM com_role a, com_role_user ur WHERE ur.role_id = a.role_id AND a.del_flag='N'

SELECT a.menu_id id, a.parent_id AS "parentId", a.parent_ids parentIds, a.name, a.href, a.target, a.icon, a.sort, (select count(cm.menu_id) from com_menu cm where cm.parent_id=a.menu_id) "hasChild", a.permission FROM com_menu a WHERE del_flag='N' AND is_show='Y' AND a.menu_id = #{id}

select.if: SELECT INSTR((SELECT parent_ids || ',' || menu_id FROM com_menu WHERE menu_id = #{menuId}), menu_Id) "sort", name "menuName", href "href", menu_id "menuId" FROM com_menu WHERE INSTR((SELECT parent_ids || ',' || menu_id FROM com_menu WHERE menu_id = #{menuId}), menu_Id) > 0 AND menu_id !='1000000' ORDER BY 1

SELECT INSTR((SELECT CONCAT(parent_ids , ',' , menu_id) FROM com_menu WHERE menu_id = #{menuId}), menu_Id) "sort", NAME "menuName", href "href", menu_id "menuId" FROM com_menu WHERE INSTR((SELECT CONCAT(parent_ids , ',', menu_id) FROM com_menu WHERE menu_id = #{menuId}), menu_Id) > 0 AND menu_id !='1000000' ORDER BY 1
